summary: Proof of concept magical storage. You cast a spell to store or retrieve items in a magical, weightless bag and you continue playing.
descriptionHtml:
[u][color=red][b]Description:[/b][/color][/u]
Proof of concept magical storage. You cast a spell to store or retrieve items in a magical, weightless bag and you continue playing.
The spell tome is on a shelf in Farengars Study (Whiterun)
Compatible with everything.

[i]If you played Levelers Tower, its the Dimensional Chest Spell in a standalone version. It is compatible with Levelers Tower version.[/i]
I made this inspired by a spell available in Levelers Tower mod from WilliamSea, wich i STRONGLY recommend. Its the best player home available for this game, IMO.

[color=red][u][b]Credits[/b][/u][/color]
WilliamSea. For allowing me to make this a standalone mod from his Levelers Tower(Dimensional Chest Spell)
author: Cotoli
